|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = <!-- Number of transmit radio chains --> |rxchains = <!-- Number of receive radio chains --> |sstreams = <!-- Number of spatial data streams --> |wirelessstand = non-compliant (Whitecap) |802.11be = <!-- Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11ay = <!-- Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11ax = <!-- 574, 1148, 4804, Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11ad = <!-- ??? Maximum throughput rated at --> |acqam = <!-- AC-qam --> |802.11ac = <!-- 433, 867, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |wififreq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, 60 --> |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = non-compliant (Whitecap) |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The PCI ID (or subsystem) for this device may be 1385:006b. {{see also|ShareWave|Cirrus Logic}} This device most likely uses the '''ShareWave''' Cresta II radio :(same as the [[Netgear WE102]]).. :the FCC ID is thus probably N9PSW22450.
==See also== *[[Netgear MA301]] - 802.11b Wireless PCI Adapter ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1385/4100 1385:4100]) *[[Netgear MA311]] - 802.11b Wireless PCI Adapter ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1385/4105 1385:4105]) / 1260:3873 *[[Netgear WG111T]] - 108 Mbps Wireless USB 2.0 Adapter (1385:4251) *[[Netgear WG311T]] v1 - 108 Mbps Wireless PCI Adapter - [[Atheros]] AR5212 ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1385/0013 1385:0013]) *[[Netgear WAG511]] v3 - 802.11a/b/g Dual Band Wireless PC Card ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1385/4400 1385:4400]) / 168c:0012 *[[Netgear WAG511]] v1/v2 ?? - ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1385/4600 1385:4600]) / 168c:0013 â€¢ ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1385/4610 1385:4610]) / 168c:0013 *[[Netgear WG511 v2]] / v3 - 54 Mbps Wireless PC Card ([http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1260/3890 1260:3890]) / 1385:4800
